item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey guys, back with another problem. Started my quest, and doing the dialogues for it.
This statement is very messy, trying to learn how exactly to do this.
Help please? I need to know how this Dialogue Case should be :s

[code] case 124:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(15004,1)) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(15004,c.getItems().getItemSlot(15004), 1);
}
sendNpcChat4(“Very Well.”, “I need you to slay a pest that has escaped!”, “Ill tele you… NOW!”, 4289,

“Johanhus Ulsbrecht”);
c.nextChat = 125;
NEED THE If STATEMENT HERE. NOT SURE WHAT TO WRITE.
c.sendMessage(“You need a quest Kit. try playing Pest Control for it!.”);
break;[/code]
